title: Research Topic: Hurricane Katrina Education Privatization Timeline (2005-2007)
summary: Based on the research priority 'Hurricane Katrina Education Privatization Timeline (2005-2007)', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Document the systematic conversion of New Orleans public schools to charter schools following Hurricane Katrina, including Milton Friedman's role and corporate beneficiaries... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
